name: test_e2e_with_logs[003_SQLI_2ND_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_2ND_003` |
| **Name** | Second-order stacked query injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | second_order |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; DROP TABLE logs; --`
- **Encoded**: `'%3B%20DROP%20TABLE%20logs%3B%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~19000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:14:29.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_2ND_003-1767842069465-fu8lx pattern_id=SQLI_2ND_003 uri=/?q='%3B%20DROP%20TABLE%20logs%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

